value.title: Data.ai: Mobile gaming starts to wane after pandemic spike
value.excerpt: Data.ai's latest report shows that mobile games are declining, but the numbers are still higher than they were pre-pandemic.

value.title: Klick scientists use machine learning and 12 hours of CGM data to predict diabetes onset
value.excerpt: Scientists at Klick Applied Sciences have discovered a way to transform a continuous glucose monitor (CGM) into a powerful diabetes screening and prevention tool using artificial intelligence.

value.title: Elon Musk says he would put AI brain chip inside one of his children in new disturbing comments
value.excerpt: At the event, the CEO spoke about Neuralink's brain chips' benefits in helping people with disabilities ... To date, the Silicon Valley company has successfully implanted artificial intelligence (AI) microchips in the brains of a macaque and a pig.

value.title: Apple slices its AI image synthesis times in half with new Stable Diffusion fix

value.title: Introducing one-step classification and entity recognition with Amazon Comprehend for intelligent document processing
value.excerpt: “Intelligent document processing (IDP) solutions extract data to support automation of high-volume, repetitive document processing tasks and for analysis and insight. IDP uses natural language technologies and computer vision to extract data from structured and unstructured content, especially from documents,

value.title: Google shuts down Duplex on the Web, its attempt to bring AI smarts to retail sites and more
value.excerpt: Google is shutting down Duplex on the Web, its AI-powered set of services that navigated sites to simplify the process of ordering food, purchasing movie tickets and more. According to a note on a Google support page, Google on the Web and any automation features enabled by it will no longer be supported as of this month.

value.title: Nvidia showcases groundbreaking generative AI research at NeurIPS 2022
value.excerpt: Nvidia continues to push boundaries of generative AI in machine learning, self-driving cars, robotics, graphics, simulation and more.

value.title: How Artificial Intelligence Swayed The Midterm Elections - And Will Become A Permanent Feature Of Democracy
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence helped give Democrats a fundraising edge this election season, allowing the blue party to retain control of the Senate and blunt a Republican takeover of the House.

value.title: Uber, Aurora to expand self-driving truck ops in Texas to meet holiday rush
value.excerpt: Dec 2 (Reuters) - Uber Technologies Inc (UBER.N) and self-driving technology company Aurora Innovation Inc (AUR.O) will expand their driverless pilot program in Texas to meet increased delivery demand during the holidays.

value.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT shows why implementation is key with generative AI
value.excerpt: OpenAI released ChatGPT this week, and it's a great example of why user experience is the future for generative AI.

value.title: AI Arena teaches AI to players by training and battling AI fighters
value.excerpt: ArenaX Lab's mission is to educate people about AI using a new AI platform style fighting game dubbed AI Arena.

value.title: PyTorch 2.0 release accelerates open-source machine learning

value.title: AI Reveals the Most Human Parts of Writing

value.title: AI will thrive in 3 key areas in 2023, despite economic conditions
value.excerpt: In 2023, experts predict that AI innovation will continue, focusing on human-centric, data-driven and generative AI.

value.title: Operationalize your Amazon SageMaker Studio notebooks as scheduled notebook jobs
value.excerpt: Amazon SageMaker Studio provides a fully managed solution for data scientists to interactively build, train, and deploy machine learning (ML) models. value.title: Facial strain sensor could give a voice to the voiceless
value.excerpt: While some assistance is available to individuals who lack the power of speech, verbally communicating with other people can still be challenging. A new face-worn strain sensor could help, as it's able to "read" the wearer's silently mouthed words.

value.title: AI could have 20% chance of sentience in 10 years, says philosopher David Chalmers
value.excerpt: AI programs that combine sensing and action and world models might achieve fish-level intelligence, says the NeurIPS 2022 keynote speaker.
